Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Tra.EXPLANATION: The percentage of orders delivered on or before the promised delivery date.
The average cost of freight per unit shipped.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Tra.FORMULA: Total Freight Cost / Total Units Shipped

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Tra.EXPLANATION: The percentage of shipments damaged during transportation.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Tra.FORMULA: (Number of Damaged Units / Total Units Shipped) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Tra.EXPLANATION: The percentage of available load capacity that is used.
The effectiveness of fuel usage in transportation operations.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Tra.FORMULA: Total Distance Traveled / Total Fuel Consumed

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Tra.EXPLANATION: A measure of the effectiveness of delivery operations based on various factors such as timeliness and quality.
The time taken for shipments to travel from the origin to the destination.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Tra.FORMULA: Total Transit Time / Number of Shipments

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Tra.EXPLANATION: The percentage of shipments that are correct in terms of quantity and items.
